name: Image.Collection

aliases.name: ItemViewer
aliases.comment: A type alias describing a view function for an item (key,image) of the collection.

aliases.name: Key
aliases.comment: The key type to access images in the collection.

values.name: defaultItemViewer
values.comment: The default itemViewer, just a simple Image viewer, not taking care of the key.

values.name: resize
values.comment: Resize all images of a collection.

values.name: view
values.comment: View a collection of images with a specific item viewer. For example, with the following code: collection = Dict.fromList [ ("1", Image "1.jpg" 320 240) , ("2", Image "2.jpg" 640 480) ] itemViewer key = Image.viewImg [ HA.class "image" ] html = collection |> view [ HA.class "collection" ] itemViewer The html will look like:
values.type: List (Html.Attribute msg) -> Image.Collection.ItemViewer msg -> Image.Collection.Collection -> Html.Html msg

name: Image

aliases.name: Image
aliases.type: { url : String, width : Int, height : Int }

values.name: resize
values.comment: Change the width and height parameters.

values.name: viewImg
values.comment: View of an Image in an tag. You can pass to it a list of html attributes that will be added in the tag. It will keep the image aspect ratio.

values.name: viewSvg
values.comment:
View of an Image inside a <svg> tag using the
[<image>](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/SVG/Element/image) tag.
